title: Dced from game for no reason even my team won the game i got no lp
body: can someone explain what going on, i can use wifi on anything except league, gladly my team won the game and i didint get a report or anything or i be really mad right now. and is there a way i can get my lp back i dont wanna my time just get wasted like this

replies.body: Based on your report and screenies, it sounds like your network is having problems reaching our services like the authentication server.  My suggest in this case would be use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot, as well as the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help make sure your settings are configured to prevent any blocks.  Let me know if you have any questions!
